name: probatory
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
used for proving, showing, or deciding something: The Court accepts the probatory value of those documents that were submitted. Oral testimony is regarded as less impressive and less probative.
More examplesFewer examplesThe evidence is part of the probatory material that will be considered.They are effectively eviscerated of their archival nature and their probatory power as proof of action.The discretionary authority of the Court allows it to request additional probatory elements, as evidence to facilitate adjudication.I have rarely read such an informative, probative and persuasive article.
